This section provides an overview of the data analysis processes for glider missions, from initial data offloading and processing to generating comprehensive mission summaries.

Click on the links below for detailed methods and instructions for each process.

-   [**Acoustic Data Pre-Processing**:](https://nmfs-ost.github.io/PAM-Glider/content/data_processing/AcousticData-preprocessing.html) Instructions for handling raw acoustic data from various glider and sensor combinations

-   [**Environmental Data Processing:**](https://nmfs-ost.github.io/PAM-Glider/content/data_processing/EnvData-processing.html) Methods for extracting and processing environmental data collected during glider deployments

-   [**Deployment Summaries**:](https://nmfs-ost.github.io/PAM-Glider/content/data_processing/DeploymentSummaries.html) Guidelines for creating post-mission reports that include sampling locations, acoustic effort, and glider paths
